colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI THU SHE YE GUNG DGA' DON LDAN ZHES BGYI BA'I 'BANGS, ,DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BLO GROS PI LIG THU, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS GNYIS KA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG NAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA'I NGO BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, DGE BSKOS BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO'O,, ,,)
